adverbs.description: enlargedly (comparative more enlargedly, superlative most enlargedly)

examples: An image observing device for enlargedly observing an image on an image screen having a plurality of pixels  […]

And hence it is that upright, self-observing souls are so full in prayer, and able to pour out their hearts so enlargedly before the Lord, in confessing their sins, and petitioning for grace, and opening their necessities, and thanking God for spiritual mercies.
